channel.title: Small forum suggestion
channel.description:
Well I know Mopar moderators have a usergroup image... sectional moderators should have some sort of usergroup image as well I think.
Main reasons:
1. Just looks to "smfish" without one 2. Helps to recognize who is staff/who is isn't for those who do not know 3. We need more pokemon? xD 4. I don't know getting random again like I said it's just a small forum suggestion I just thought of. No real though has been done in it just a thought. Therefore, no poll shall be made. I just want to get opinions.
Just a small afterthought...you wouldn't need it shown in other forums (as it's a sectional position) I would imagine there is some way to tweak the usergroup images part to do this.

item.title: Small forum suggestion
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

Facepalm button.

Read full topic

item.title: Small forum suggestion
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

Often a few weeks after a new sectional moderator has been appointed they will get promoted to full global mopar mod. However there are a few sectionals over mitb I know of which get no recognition outside of their section.

Guess it would be helpful.

Read full topic

item.title: Small forum suggestion
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Acorn_, post:5, topic:430668”]Personally I think you’d make a pretty good Moderator Love. (Completely off topic)
And yea I also agree with your idea as well.[/quote]lol thanks :o

and to be totally truthful…due to the account problems I have had in the past I highly doubt I would be trusted as a mod :rolleyes:

@ David it’s a good sign when fellow moderators agree about the suggestion

Read full topic
